segments.text: Can you help me set up my voicemail message ? I just got this service and I am not really sure what I am supposed to say .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! You just basically gotta let the caller know who they called , and ask them for their contact information so you can call them back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , so can I say , " This is Abby's voicemail . I will call you later , so leave me your name and number " .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's more or less the idea , but try something that sounds more friendly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , so how about this , " This is Abby and I am really happy you called ! I promise I will give you a ring as soon as I can , so please leave me your name and number . Talk to you soon ! " .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A little too friendly Abby . Just say this , " Hi , you have reached Abby . I am unable to answer your call right now , but if you leave me your name and phone number , I will get back to you as soon as possible . Thanks " .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's perfect ! Can you say that again and record it for me ?
segments.speaker: S1
